original_title: Changa Changa, rythmes en noirs et blancs
overview: A rare documentary made in Brussels in the early nineties collecting witnesses on how local and Congolese musicians enriched each other including internationally known stars such as Manu Dibango, Toots Tielemans, Vaya Con Dios, Phillippe Catherine, Victor Laszlo,  Zap Mama...
title: Changa Changa, rythmes en noirs et blancs
